analyzed: ba byed tog dang byug ba dang dri dang byed ma dang gos la sogs ba la

analyzed: dri bzang po bdug spros kyis bdag la bdug na skye bo thams cad dga ba

original: sreg byas na de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bza' ba dang btung ba la mngon par

analyzed: bsngags te byin na de dbang du gyur bu chen po ra dza dang pan+di ta dbang du

analyzed: byed ba na yungs kar la sngags te sbyin sreg byed nas tshhes grangs

analyzed: kum dang pur dang wam dam srin lag gi khrag gam tshan dan dmar po sgom tsha na ut+pa la

analyzed: ut+pa la dab ma can gyi khor lo rtshib drug ba byed lo dbus su

analyzed: skor ba mu khyud gsum byed ba srad bu dmar pos dkri tshhil la byed

analyzed: ba ling ga sor bzhi ba snying gi dbus su jug ldeng gi mes gdung

analyzed: gnyis sam mo la skye gnas su bugs ste mo la gdung ba byed na dbang du du ba the

analyzed: gsung lhag ba bsam ba ba byed ba nam bgrang ba sgom
